name: Sushobhit Rajan
tagline: Lead SSE with Applied ML Focus at Amazon
bio: I'm a software engineer with 10+ years of experience building scalable distributed systems, machine learning platforms, and payment solutions at leading tech companies including AWS, Amazon, Salesforce, and Flipkart.

Currently at AWS, I lead storage optimization and performance initiatives for AWS EBS. Previously, I architected Amazon's co-branded credit card platform for Europe and Japan, built Einstein AI-powered sales enablement tools at Salesforce, and created personalized recommendation systems at Flipkart.
I'm passionate about solving complex problems at scale, leveraging machine learning for real-world impact, and building systems that millions of users rely on every day.
highlights: Led technical strategy for Amazon Payment Products across Europe and Japan
Built ML-powered recommendation systems serving millions of users
Specialized in distributed systems, scalable architecture, and machine learning
